exotic.name: Winds of Fortune
exotic.description: All encounter rewards are empowered.

exotic.name: Serendipitous Breeze
exotic.description: All journey activity results are improved to the next tier up.

exotic.name: Malevolent Darkness
exotic.description: There is no sunlight.

exotic.name: Bloody Sky
exotic.description: +1 hostile random encounter.

exotic.name: Cruel Haze
exotic.description: At the start of each creature's turn in combat, they lose hit points equal to the round number.

exotic.name: Golden Sky
exotic.description: +1 positive random encounter.

exotic.name: Freaky Day
exotic.description: Each player rolls a d20. In descending order, each player gives their character sheet to the next.

exotic.name: Strange Music on the Wind
exotic.description: At the start of each creature's turn in combat, they swap spaces with another random creature in the combat.

exotic.name: Gaze of the Assassin
exotic.description: All hostile random encounters have 1 additional Challenge and have their rewards empowered.

exotic.name: Gaze of the Gambler
exotic.description: Whenever an adventurer casts a spell or uses a maneuver, they trigger a Wild Magic Surge.

exotic.name: Gaze of the Legion
exotic.description: All hostile random encounters contain 1 additional foe and their rewards are empowered twice.

exotic.name: Gaze of the Manipulator
exotic.description: Each player sends the DM a message with the name of an adventurer in the current session, with no discussion. If any adventurer's name is received twice, that adventurer has disadvantage with all journey activities, and all other adventurers have advantage. If an adventurer's name appears more than twice, they get double advantage and all others get disadvantage instead. If no adventurer's name appears more than once, all adventurer get disadvantage.

exotic.name: Gaze of the Creator
exotic.description: Each adventurer's maximum HP is halved, but all damage they and their minions deal is doubled.

exotic.name: Mists of Slaughter
exotic.description: All hostile random encounters are pooled into one massive combat at the end of the day where all monsters are hostile with all other creatures. All creatures start in random locations at the start of the combat.

exotic.name: Eyes in the Mist
exotic.description: Creatures always have line of sight to all other creatures within 60' of them.

exotic.name: Distant Tolling
exotic.description: All adventurers start each combat with 1 failed death save and all monsters have 25% fewer maximum hit points.

exotic.name: The Scent of Meat
exotic.description: Each monster killed by the party drops 1 additional organ.

exotic.name: Lonely Haze
exotic.description: At the start of combat, each player randomly is assigned 1 random, unassigned monster until there are no unassigned monsters left. Each adventurer and their assigned monster will be separated into their own pocket dimension to fight. An adventurer's dimension, and all creatures in it, merge into another random adventurer's dimension whenenever either all adventurers in that dimension are unconscious or there are no monsters in it.

exotic.name: Winds of Chaos
exotic.description: Instead of using their usual skill bonuses for journey activities, each adventurer instead rolls a d20 and uses that result as their bonus. This is rolled after the player has chosen their activity.

exotic.name: Feywild Trickery
exotic.description: Players cannot choose their own journey activities. Instead, random ones are chosen for each adventurer and the check becomes a 50/50 chance of either critical failure or critical success. All adventurers must attempt a journey activity.

exotic.name: Delirious Fog
exotic.description: Each adventurer gains a trigger-spell Chaotic modifier.

exotic.name: Echoing Silence
exotic.description: Players cannot communicate with each other and must have their eyes closed unless either it is their turn or they are being affected by a monster in some way.

exotic.name: Chaos Storm
exotic.description: At the start of each creature's turn in combat, they gain a random condition.

exotic.name: Blood Rain
exotic.description: Whenever the party defeats all enemies in a hostile random encounter, a random one of the creatures from the encounter is resurrected and immediately takes an additional turn. The encounter's rewards are empowered.

exotic.name: Growls Beyond the Fog
exotic.description: All hostile random encounters are pooled into one massive combat, with each original combat staggered in waves. After the first wave, all adventurers are healed to full HP and initiative is rerolled for the second combat. Loot from a single combat is doubled and empowered.
